data.trans_hint: Đội ngũ nhân viên ở đây luôn sẵn lòng trò chuyện với các bạn nhỏ để giúp trả lời băn khoăn của các bạn về phòng tranh.
data.en_hint: Staff members here are willing to engage with children to answer their questions about the art gallery.
data.content_game_1: Staff members here are willing to engage with children to answer their questions about the art gallery.
data.answer_en_hint: Staff members here are willing to engage with children to answer their questions about the art gallery.

data.trans_hint: Để tiếp nối hoạt của chúng mình, giờ cô sẽ dẫn các em sang phòng tranh tĩnh vật.
data.en_hint: To follow our activities up, I would like to guide you through the room of still-life paintings.
data.content_game_1: to follow our activities up, I would like to guide you through the room of still-life paintings.
data.answer_en_hint: to follow our activities up, I would like to guide you through the room of still-life paintings.

data.trans: Nhận phản ứng tiêu cực (từ phía ai)
data.trans_hint: Khu phòng tranh đó nhận khá nhiều phản ứng tiêu cực từ phía các bậc phụ huynh vì đã từng có mấy vụ tai nạn ở đó.
data.en_hint: That art gallery goes down badly with parents in the neighborhood as there have been several cases of accidents there.
data.content_game_1: That art gallery goes down badly with parents in the neighborhood as there have been several cases of accidents there.
data.answer_en_hint: That art gallery goes down badly with parents in the neighborhood as there have been several cases of accidents there.

data.trans_hint: Các con à, các con nên nói khẽ khi ở trong phòng tranh nhé.
data.en_hint: Hey kids, you should keep your voice down when you are in an art gallery.
data.content_game_1: Hey kids, you should keep your voice down when you are in an art gallery.
data.answer_en_hint: Hey kids, you should keep your voice down when you are in an art gallery.

data.trans: Cung cấp (các hoạt động giải trí, dịch vụ)
data.trans_hint: Phòng tranh của chúng tôi cũng cung cấp dịch vụ ăn uống cho các bạn nhỏ ở khu căng tin.
data.en_hint: Our art gallery also lays food services on for kids in the canteen.
data.content_game_1: Our art gallery also lays food services on for kids in the canteen.
data.answer_en_hint: Our art gallery also lays food services on for kids in the canteen.

data.trans: Chọn ra (người hoặc thứ gì đó)
data.trans_hint: Cô giáo sẽ chọn ra một bạn nhỏ để thuyết trình về những gì các em đã được quan sát hôm nay.
data.en_hint: The teacher will pick out a kid to present about what they have seen in the art gallery today.
data.content_game_1: The teacher will pick out a kid to present about what they have seen in the art gallery today.
data.answer_en_hint: The teacher will pick out a kid to present about what they have seen in the art gallery today.

data.trans_hint: Lên kế hoạch trước cho chuyên đi thực tế đến phòng tranh thành phố của các con là một ý tưởng tốt.
data.en_hint: It's a good idea to plan ahead for the field trip to the city art gallery for our children.
data.content_game_1: It's a good idea to plan ahead for the field trip to the city art gallery for our children.
data.answer_en_hint: It's a good idea to plan ahead for the field trip to the city art gallery for our children.

data.trans_hint: Cô giáo in các bộ câu hỏi ra cho các bạn nhỏ trả lời trong quá trình thăm quan buổi triển lãm nghệ thuật.
data.en_hint: The teacher printed the questionnaire out for those kids to answer when they were visiting the art exhibition.
data.content_game_1: The teacher printed the questionnaire out for those kids to answer when they were visiting the art exhibition.
data.answer_en_hint: The teacher printed the questionnaire out for those kids to answer when they were visiting the art exhibition.

data.trans: Đọc kỹ thông tin về (ai hoặc cái gì)
data.trans_hint: Sau khi đọc kỹ thông tin về chủ đề của buổi triển lãm, tôi quyết định đưa lũ trẻ đến đó.
data.en_hint: After reading up about the theme of the exhibition, I decided to take my kids there.
data.content_game_1: After reading up about the theme of the exhibition, I decided to take my kids there.
data.answer_en_hint: After reading up about the theme of the exhibition, I decided to take my kids there.

data.trans: Tự do, bay cao bay xa (không kiểm soát)
data.trans_hint: Lũ trẻ được khuyến khích để trí tưởng tượng bay cao, bay xa khi viết bài thu cho chuyến đi thực tế đến phòng tranh.
data.en_hint: The children were encouraged to let their imaginations run riot when it comes to writing reviews for the field trip to the art gallery.
data.content_game_1: The children were encouraged to let their imaginations run riot when it comes to writing reviews for the field trip to the art gallery.
data.answer_en_hint: The children were encouraged to let their imaginations run riot when it comes to writing reviews for the field trip to the art gallery.

data.trans_hint: Bạn không nên né tránh những chủ đề có lẽ không gây hứng thú cho lũ trẻ vì biết đâu đó lại là một cơ hội tốt để chúng khám phá thêm những điều mới mẻ.
data.en_hint: You shouldn't shy away from subjects that may not interest the children as it can be a perfect chance for them to explore new things.
data.content_game_1: You shouldn't shy away from subjects that may not interest the children as it can be a perfect chance for them to explore new things.
data.answer_en_hint: You shouldn't shy away from subjects that may not interest the children as it can be a perfect chance for them to explore new things.

data.trans_hint: Thái độ tồi đối với trẻ em của đội ngũ nhân viên thực sự khiến các bậc phụ huynh mất hứng trong suốt buổi triển lãm.
data.en_hint: The staff members' bad attitudes towards children really turned the parents off during the exhibition.
